attributes.action: Reform voting system of the United Kingdom so it truly represents the people.
attributes.background: The 2015 General Election produced a government which only 37% of the country voted for. The current 'first past the post' system does not represent what people want; it is a backward system that needs solving.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104868

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
